author: RustyG
description: My experience with Lazarus has been awesome so far. Top quality product. I use this daily and it really helps. Thanks for the great service and products Lazarus.

author: Albert Ibanez
description: Great product really did work for me but I did fail a urine test for a good job at a refinery.

author: FBMBoomer
description:
I can only add my enthusiastic approval to all the other reviews. I take this 3 times a day. I take it just before going to be and it allows me to sleep right through the night. I am old, 77. I have the usual aches and pains that come with age. This product improves my quality of life a lot.

I should note that I have purchased CBD oil from another vendor. It worked fine for me for a couple of years. Then they started watering their product to get more profit from each sale. It was a stupid thing to do. They poisoned the well forever for me. Paying the same price and getting 50 percent of of the advertised amount of CBD oil should be illegal and it sure is reckless of them to do that for quick profit. Their name starts with E and they had a good reputation. They refused to answer any of my emails about this problem. Lazarus has been independently tested and lives up to their listed concentration of CBD oil. It tastes terrible and I don’t care. It really improves my quality of life in my old age. I hope Lazarus continues to sell high quality products as they are now.

BTW, independent testing show that most CBD oil sold from brick and mortar stores has very little or zero CBD oil. Mostly zero. We are lucky to have a reputable source for our CBD needs. I am grateful.

author: Trish Coppick
description: This is my fav flavor. I use every night and the results are great.

author: Robin
description: I use this every weekend. During the week I’m boring Administrative Assistant, but during the weekend I’m super-fly-cool-ass-laid back, GIRL!

author: Maureen Hunt
description: My first disappointment was when my order was received…the bottle had leaked quite a bit (even though the plastic wrap was intact) and it was quite a mess. I had notified the company, (included a photo), but haven’t heard a word. The efficacy of this formula is marginal, and I’m still adjusting the dosage to help with my sleep situation. It would have been nice to hear from Lazarus about the condition of the product upon my receipt.

author: Melissa
description: There’s no question this is the best CBD out there, but I wish it were less expensive. I can only afford to buy during their sales, and even that is pushing it financially for the amount I need to be effective. Still, I save only for this company because it truly is the best CBD out there. Thanks for your consistent high quality tinctures.

author: Auty Howard
description: I wanna thank Lazarus for giving me the Veteran discount. I ordered the 6000mg bottle. This is the real deal. God bless you Lazarus, thank you for taking good care of us veterans.

author: Bobby H
description: I can’t say enough good things about LN CBD tinctures. The 750mg high potency is a wonderful tasting full spectrum tincture that helps me. I’m so thankful I found LN. I’ve compared the prices of all the truly legitimate CBD sellers (via r/CBD reddit group) and you get the best product per your dollar when you buy LN.

author: Vicky
description: First day will rate later, so far great!

author: Jessicaorlena
description: It’s a great thing to find a company that goes over and above. Thank you.

author: CHDmom
description: I have tried 2 other “5 star” companies high potency oils and Lazarus is by far the best in terms of results, taste, and value/cost. Your product is phenomenal, as is the customer service. Thank you!!!

author: Joshus
description: The CBD oil is a very good quality product. I immediately noticed the effects shortly after each serving. I only take about 10mg per serving two times a day, so the 750mg bottle lasted me a month. Lazarus Naturals really has made a great product at the best price I could find after searching online for days comparing different companies. I find that this oil helps me so much.

author: Jax
description: Going to buy a bottle and put it to the test. Will update after I receive it and let you know my results.

author: Hunny
description: Saw results the first day. Thank you so much.

author: joshjames
description: Just ordered my second time. Love the service, price and outcome. Keep up the good work Lazarus Naturals. Thanks for keeping the price reasonable. While this is the only company I have used, it works like you would think it would. I can’t believe that this stuff is just new to the public. Crazy! You can’t go wrong with Lazarus.

author: rebeccanate
description: Love this product. It’s highly effective. I like that it’s high potency so I don’t have to take as much product to get an adequate serving. I’ve tried other CBD oils and I favor this over the others. The price is great and so is the customer service.

author: Rf01261
description:
Let me start off by saying I never review products unless I get some sort of rewards points or something but with this, I honestly cannot praise this company enough. I have tried countless CBD companies and NONE and I mean NONE measure up to LN. Their customer service is unbeatable and the assistance programs they offer are honestly a gift from God.

The product actually works. I use the high potency full spectrum and I use a dropper full or two depending on my day and in about 30 minutes I am calm and ready for bed.

If you’re on the fence about it, just jump because you will NOT be disappointed in this product.

author: vicsosa47
description:
Love this tincture
This works so much better than the thc I use.
You really should try this

author: cworret
description: Been using consistently for a long time now. Very good!

author: Eddy Hyde
description: very excited to try this product, heard wonderful things.

author: Jason Van Midde
description: Great taste and potency. Ordered on Saturday and it arrived Monday, 2 days early from expected delivery date. Love the biodegradable packaging too. Great product and service. Thanks Lazarus!

author: Jensyn Seiger
description: Amazing quality CBD. I love the smell, the taste and the effects. Can’t say enough great things about this and the company

author: rebeccawells3766
description: Great product. Very fast delivery and the customer service is by far better than any store! Love that this company offers discounts. Great company, products, and awesome people.

author: Frank
description: Great stuff, smooth and efficient

author: David Lyle
description: I love this product! I think it tastes great. On my third bottle now and l plan on keeping it going. Had a question and customer service was very prompt to get back to me, and the service agent was very helpful and friendly. Very pleased with the company so far.

author: Arnie
description: I’ve been using the 6000 mg full spectrum oil for a little over a year now and I honestly can’t live without it! You get what you pay for, LN is a high quality product worth the extra money.

author: Diana Johnson
description: Thank you, Lazarus Naturals, for your veterans program! My husband and I are both veterans and both take your CBD high potency tincture primarily for joint pain.Praise God for making the hemp plant and thank you for making it available to the masses! Some people talk about the taste but it really isn’t bad, y’all! I would MUCH rather take a natural product than pop pills that man has made chemically! Thanks again, Lazarus Naturals!

author: Sweetirie
description:
Works great! I just wish you didn’t have to take so much of the oil, as the taste becomes quite overwhelming. Not a pleasant taste at all. Have to chase it down with OJ. Perhaps in the future you could make the same high potency in a smaller bottle so you take far fewer drops of oil. :)

But it works well! And Lazarus has awesome customer service! My first package got lost in the mail and they shipped out a new one no questions asked, the same day! Thank you guys!!

author: Michael Freund
description:
We are glad you are enjoying our products as well as our customer service! You may want to try our RSO if you are looking for something more concentrated. It contains twice the amount of CBD per milliliter (100mg of CBD/ml) and has a thicker consistency.

https://www.lazarusnaturals.com/shop/rso/cbd-1000-mg

author: Tracy L Lersch
description:
3000mg is the best!!! I think it works better than any brand I tried! I like the earthy taste :)
Thankfully I qualified for the discount program! Love the company ethics and friendly person on the phone when I call!!!

author: Diane
description: A friend of mine lost her job because thc showed up on her drug screen.

author: Michael Freund
description: Hi Diane, we wanted to give some feedback on this subject. Our products are made from hemp which is naturally low in THC, however, they do contain federally acceptable levels of THC. Our full spectrum products contain up to 0.3% THC by weight. Our isolate based tinctures have an undetectable level of THC per our testing standards. However, we do not recommend CBD products for those who are worried about drug testing as there are many shared compounds between hemp and marijuana that could cause a false positive.

author: Lana Appel
description: I have tried a number of CBD tinctures, this is by far the best!! Thank You!!

author: Rachelg
description:
This is not the first company I have tried but will probably be the last.
I love them!
Their oil is working wonders for myself and my son.
I also use it on myself and my husband topically straight from the bottle or with a lotion I’ve made and it’s amazing how good we feel afterwards.

Not to mention that their prices are amazing, they offer even more discounts on top of that, and they’re one of the only companies I’ve seen so far that offer batch testing with every batch they make not just testing once a year or every few months.

author: Stephen Goodman
description: After starting with another 300 mg isolate from another brand, I ordered a 225 regular tincture LN. While some like the full spectrum flavor, I can’t handle putting it under my tongue (the most efficient way to absorb it as opposed to swallowing it, ingesting it, which takes a higher serving for the same effect). I ordered the wintermint 750 high potency which has really helped me. It is dramatically better. And I can put it under my tongue. I would like to take a full spectrum high potency that tastes like the isolate. How about it, guys? Please. Could you email me?

author: Michael Freund
description: Hi Stephen, this is something we are currently working on. The difficulty with full spectrum products is that the terpenes and plant matter which people attribute benefits to, also bring with them the essential flavors of hemp. We have designed two new full spectrum flavors (french vanilla mocha and chocolate mint) which mask the hemp flavor, but it will be a few months until we have ramped up the production necessary to support these products.

author: roddmullett1
description: I had a very traumatic event and this CBD oil has help lesson my worry and stress. I feel I can function better and for the first time in years I can get a full night sleep. I used to lift weights and competed in bodybuilding for 10 years and this has actually helped my joints and mobility, at almost 50 years of age things don’t work like they used too but this CBD oil sure does help. Our dog is old and gets very stressed and the pet tincture is a solid one-two punch for him and he can get up and down the stairs much better and doesn’t freak out as much when he is on it. You make an amazing product and I am glad I pulled the trigger on the order. I am ordering more and you have a loyal customer now, for me and my pets.

author: Michael
description: Received my first order about a month ago. Wanted to try it before giving feedback. I would frequently wake up at night with my hands just throbbing. I ordered the high potency tropical isolate. I have been taking a total of 60mg a day split into two servings. I have also noticed it has a calming effect. Order was processed immediately and shipped right away with tracking. I am going to order the full spectrum when it is time for a refill as I can see it may work better for my needs. I would highly recommend LN and their products.

author: Jen
description: Great communication in the service department! Got it in 3 days, just took about 18ish MG and hoping for the best for pain relief. Will be submitting another review in a week!

author: RustyG
description: My experience with Lazarus has been awesome so far. Top quality product. I use this daily and it really helps. Thanks for the great service and products Lazarus.

description: Great product really did work for me but I did fail a urine test for a good job at a refinery.

description: I love this product. The discount for being disabled is great. 60 percent off helps so much. For the 3000 mg bottle I pay 44 dollars and then I buy the RSO in the smaller one for 16. Once one of my bottles clumped up, I took a picture and sent it to them. In a few days they replaced it. I ordered some for my mother’s little dog in Tennessee. Thank you Lazarus Naturals.

description: I’ve tried many CBDs in the past and they did nothing. I heard about LN through the grapevine and decided to give it a try. People, THIS IS THE REAL DEAL!You better believe I am a customer for LIFE! Thanks Lazarus Naturals!

author: Kitty
description: This high potency tincture is the BEST! I’ve tried a few other brands, but Lazarus has a consistently good product. A dropper full under the tongue and you can feel the effects shortly. I’ve tried most of the flavours with the “Classic” one being my favourite. It’s an earthy, green taste that after you swallow, leaves no aftertaste. Do your research and you’ll see that Lazarus is truly the best bang for your buck!

author: stelina
description: Great product! I have used 3 other brands and this is by far the BEST! Seems with other brands I could not really tell if working, but with Lazarus Naturals I really notice the difference! MANY THANKS!!!

description: I purchased the High Potency Full Spectrum CBD oil tincture and will continue to do so because of the great results we have gotten. Try it, you’ll like it. Also grateful for the assistance and the quick service. Lazarus Naturals is the place for me. Best Regards.

description: Good work

description: I am a first time CBD user and this has been a very good experience. Lazarus is a true pleasure to deal with. description: I am really looking forward to trying your product

description: I use the 3000mg twice a day and I feel like a new person. You are helping those who cant afford this and are a blessing to help others. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for being the best in the field. I have told others to skip the rest and go with the best – Lazarus is #1 ?

description: My son-in-law has been taking the high potency full spectrum CBD oil for just over a year. His family is thrilled with the change they have noticed. Without the Assistance Program, we never would have been able to do this. Thank you for your transparency, integrity, and compassion.

author: Gregman51
description: Thank you Lazarus naturals for such a wonderful product. The discount they give you with the assistance program is very very nice and extremely helpful. I’ve been using Lazarus Naturals now for only 8 days and love it. I recommend this to everyone. I also ordered the massage oil, the balm and a large bottle of Pet Tincture for my dog. Everyone should try it also. I highly recommend the 3000 or the 6000 mg full spectrum high potency. That is the best value for your money. You will not find anyone to match this. I love that the dropper has the markings so you know exactly how much you are getting. I personally do not know of any other company that does this and I’m so thankful that Lazarus Naturals aids us in this way. You do not have to count the drops! You may also call them up with any questions and they will spend time answering all of them without trying to rush you off. They are a company that is interested in helping us. I’m very grateful to you! I will be a customer for life and will be recommending it to every one. Thanks again. Very sincerely, Greg Tritle

author: bonitasmith1954
description: I have been using the 6000mg bottle for over a year. I literally cannot express how much Lazarus priducts have changed my quality of life. The full spectrum tinctures are of superior quality. I have recommended Lazarus Naturals to so many and will continue purchasing from them forever!!

author: dllee
description: I’m getting ready to place my 3rd order. This has made a huge difference not only with my sleep, but it has helped my mood. Truthfully, I wasn’t expecting this to help…..I’m so happy that I was wrong. I have recommended this company and product to everyone. Thank you Lazarus Naturals for changing my life and for helping me to continue purchasing this product.

author: Tad Gilbreath
description: Thank you for your product and your financial assistance. I literally can’t live without this. I’m on SSI and Medicaid now. This CBD has allowed me to move and flex and do much much more in my life. Thank you for increasing the assistance program. My food stamps are going to $20 a month and the extra assistance really helps to make it through the month financially. Thank you thank you thank you. For everything. Let me know if there is anything I can do for your company.

author: Uberstephanie
description: Amazing product and definitely the best on the market. So grateful to Lazarus Naturals for their quality products!

author: PghPammy
description: My husband and I both feel very blessed to have found Lazarus Naturals. Absolutely excellent products and customer service! With both of us needing CBD while being on disability, their discount program is a God send. Love this company!

author: dacg
description: Thank you and please continue your good work,

author: Cocktails711
description: I have been using this for about 2 months and love it. This has made it possible for me to actually go to work. Thank you so much for the assistance program it is so helpful for low-income families. Also, the veterans who have served our country deserve to be able to get a quality product at a great price and I would like to thank them for their service to our country.

description: Thank you for creating such a quality product – I’ve recommended and will be a fan for life!

author: zeroswiper
description:
I tell everyone I know online and IRL about Lazarus. If you’re buying elsewhere you’re likely wasting your money.

Solid product at a solid price!

Thank you kindly for your assistance program! This has literally saved my life!

author: Brenda
description: This product is wonderful. I have my life back!!! Thank you so much for making this product. I’m a customer for life.

author: Holly
description: I just received my second order of CBD oil ever and it defintely won’t be my last from Lazarus. After researching CBD oil brands to my heart’s content, I landed on Lazarus as it seems to be one of the top five best brands. That coupled with being the most economical led me to place my first CBD oil order with them. Their shipping to me (in Portland) the past two orders have always gotten here within two days, and I dig their product — although I don’t have anyting to compare it to. All in all, this is a five star company and you really can’t go wrong.

They have gained a loyal customer, and I will continue to sing their praises to my friends, family, clients, and anyone that will listen. As so many before me have said, if your wondering if you should try their products, wonder no more. Many thanks Lazarus Naturals. Another customer for life!

description: I cannot say enough about this product. Nothing I’ve tried compares and I’ve tried several reputable brands. I am amazed at the small amount I need to get the feeling I want. You won’t be sorry. Thx Lazarus!!!!

All my love FOREVER! ~M

Thank you once again, you have a customer for life!!

description: I have tried other companies CBD products and Lazurus Naturals has been by far been the most effective. I use this tincture every day and it helps me tremendously.

author: Todd
description: It has helped improve my quality of life, and it is by far the best priced CBD in the industry. Win-win.

author: FrankAlfano
description: By far the best price and strength works wonder highly recommend it

author: Jschling64
description: I am a 55 yr old grandmother of 6. Over the last few years, I have tried many CBD products. My goal is to become Pharma-free. On the day my package arrived I was in serious discomfort. Within 45 minutes it was calmed by half. Needless to say that I was impressed. I am ordering more. This one has a strong “natural” taste, and some may not like it, but that’s why there are flavors. ;) I like that they are pesticide free, gluten free, and vegan. Earth consciousness is alive here with bio-degradable packing peanuts! The Assistance program is a huge bonus for those of us living on fixed incomes, and I <3 you guys for that!!! Thank you.

author: SoulEyes
description: This is an excellent product—it contains the highest percentage of CBD of any I’ve found, has a pleasant flavor, and is effective. Have been using another company’s isolate for half a year or so, but I am going to buy exclusively from Lazarus Naturals from now on. I began using Lazarus Naturals’ full spectrum high potency CBD tincture several months ago, because I wanted to see if the entourage effect was a real thing. In my experience, yes it is! Now I am going to buy Lazarus Naturals’ isolate as well and use the two products in conjunction. I appreciate that Lazarus Naturals provides independent labs that show exactly what their products contain. When I first began buying CBD, it was confusing to compare brands. But once I did the math, I could see for myself that Lazarus Naturals was offering a better deal and a better product. I also love their social-conscience discounts for people with disabilities, veterans, and people with an income below the poverty line. I can’t name one other company that does this to the extent that Lazarus Naturals does. I myself have a disability, so I deeply appreciate Lazarus Naturals’ compassion. Thank you!

author: Allgoodl
description: I’ve been taking the 750mg oil for about a month now. It has definitely helped my body relax. I don’t mind the taste, I’ve tasted worst. I’m in the states and shipping takes about a week, which is a little long so plan your next buy before you get low. All in all, Lazarus Naturals is the real deal. Thank you.

author: Campbellj
description:
Great results, Amazing product.
I noticed improvements in my stress management and sleep quality. I love the CBD, and I’m equally impressed at what this company is doing for veterans. Its not often that you come across a company who seems genuinely passionate about what they do and the people that they help. Thank you Lazarus Naturals for not only making awesome products, but for restoring my faith in humanity. Well done!

author: bmart
description: LN has great customer service and products. I messed up the shipping address on my order, they sent me an email stating such, I replied back wit correct address. Took a couple days no response so I called and left a message with my changes of address they called me back an hour later and 2nd day air the package the same day. Quality product and service. Thank you

author: [email protected]
description: I had a few issues with shipping but the customer service team was so friendly and professional. They resolved my issue. Excited to do more business with your wonderful staff and company!

author: SandraLavoie
description: I bought the 3000mg because I have a problem sleeping at night. This stuff is very good. It helps me to relax enough to fall asleep. It is very earthy tasting but I got used to the taste. Thank you Lazarus Naturals for offering such great products.

author: Rsdukes
description:
I had been using super overly priced Charlotte’s Web. So happy I found Lazarus Naturals! You guys offer the best discounts around for people who really need it.
Thank you!

author: TomG
description: I’m very happy impressed with the results from the LN full spectrum tinctures. It is helping me with my sleep, providing me with a clear head and relaxing feeling. I highly recommend you give them a try! Also, you can’t beat their Veteran discount!!!

author: molinaWILL03
description: This year I gave CBD a try after many people recommended I try it. I had researched several companies, but I didn’t know how I’d be able to afford the higher quality products. I was so glad to see that Lazarus Naturals assist those on disability. I bought several products in different strengths. After using the High Potency, Full Spectrum, I’m happy to report that after eight years…yes, EIGHT years, I can sleep through the night without waking up every ½ – 1hr. I’m not sleeping a whole 8 hours, but the 4 to 5 hours a night without waking up has been a blessing! I can’t believe how restful I feel in the morning. Thank you Lazarus Natural!!! I can’t even express how grateful I am!

author: dennyshelleyky
description: I have tried many cbd oils and this one is the best ! Thank you so much for the military discount it allows me to take it everyday ! GODBLESS

author: BecLux
description: I have been using the high potency for awhile now. It really helps me. This is a wonderful company to buy from. I will be referring others to use your product.

author: Sheri Perry
description:
Wonderful product. Fast delivery. I love that test results are published.
My discomfort is reduced I sleep better and I am able to concentrate more.

author: Leffew
description:
I’ve researched several companies that sell CBD oil. The one MUST I was searching for, it had to be completely from the United States. So many companies import the hemp they use to make their products. You just never know why you are getting. The quality of this oil is phenomenal. I’ve tried a couple others, not many made in U.S. The fact that the company offers discounts to Veterans and restricted income is an added bonus.

My husband and I both have problems sleeping. The high potency, full spectrum oil has helped tremendously for us. The only reason it didn’t get five stars is the limited flavors of the HP, full spectrum oils. Most are the isolate base. I’m not sure about those yet. Haven’t made up my mind on trying those yet.
Keep up the good work!

author: [email protected]
description:
I used the high potency full spectrum CBD oil and it truly helped me. Please understand that everyone is different, but for me I noticed an improvement in my overall wellness since I started using the full spectrum CBD.
Thank you Lazarus Naturals for all you do and for the support you clearly have for Veterans and those with disabilities.

author: Gegatso
description: I’m on my second bottle and could not be more pleased. Someone suggested trying CBD and I went through a few brands that were not even reputable, nor affordable being on disability income. A friend introduced me to Lazarus Naturals and not only does it work, but so far it has helped me more than I ever thought. I really appreciate the fact that not only does Lazarus Naturals give third party test results, but the assistance program for low income people like myself is a Godsend. I would not be able to have the products otherwise. I’d give the company and the product 10 out of 5 stars! Excellent people, products, and they are conscious of the environment as well! I’m not even getting into talking about how much it has helped my elderly mother!

author: debbiedage
description: UPDATE…before re-ordering, I decided to call Lazarus Naturals to make sure I ordered something without such a strong flavor. I didn’t get the woman’s name, but she was so helpful and kind!! She explained very well the differences, etc. I told her how I felt about the bottle I ordered. She offered to email me a mailing label to return the tincture and she is sending out a replacement bottle TODAY! It was probably the nicest customer service I have ever received!! As I said in my last post, the product works, it was only the flavor. Thank you Lazarus Naturals!!!

author: Miel
description: This is my first time trying CBD and I feel no changes. I tried multiple servings, nothing ! As a previous smoker and vaper, I know by fact that THC or CBD makes my stomach better in less than an hour, but I can’t get results with this CBD oil. I would happily update my rating if I get results. Could you provide me advices ? Are you allowed to suggest a serving size? For now, I’m at 0.5ml in the morning and 0.5ml at night. Thank you!

author: G1zm0
description: Tried 3 different companies, Lazarus Naturals is the BEST quality CBD and prices around! The Assistance Program is a TRUE blessing. I can actually stock up to ensure I always have my CBD!

author: OkieBandit
description: I’m very happy with the results that Lazarus Naturals CBD oil has done for me, I’m sleeping better, has calmed me down, and just all around feeling so much better, I’m telling a lot of my friends about Lazarus Naturals!

author: AliceB56
description: I am a 56 year old woman. My daughter sent me some of this tincture. The CBD tincture helps. I have tried many other CBD brands and I am impressed. Thank you for the discount. I will send all of my veteran friends to your website.

author: Fhunjunkie
description: Definitely will add this to my monthly grocery list.

author: alex179
description: I love the hempy flavor. It tastes very clean too. No unnecessary additives or other junk. It’s exactly what I wanted and expect from a quality CBD tincture. Thanks!

author: Garrett Fuller
description: This is the best product and fairest price. This is the only CBD I will be buying from now on.

author: rorynidaho
description:
Thank you Lazarus Naturals for a Great CBD Tincture at a great price! I use your assistance program, so double thank you!
I’ve tried many others before this, this is the best one. I’ll keep coming back.

author: Tommyval34
description: I have tried a lot of oils both isolates and full spectrum. This right here is the most superior cbd product on the market! The smell, taste, effects everything about it is amazing!

author: Jeanne573
description: Been using CBD products since 2012. Tried this Lazurus tincture out for first time. Extremely impressed with product quality, price, veterans discount AND customer service. Highly recommend!

author: Ethan Eliam
description: Excellent product and vendor

author: tomwilson1021
description: Amazing product. I am so grateful to Lazarus Naturals for the Assistance Program, I would normally not be able to afford the right concentration of CBD I need. Thank you so much!

author: joey852
description: Best CBD oil I’ve tried thus far. I was interested in Lazarus Naturals because of their assistance program which was a real life-saver for me. However, not only are their prices cheap but they also make a great product. Because it is full spectrum, it feels more relaxing than THC- free tinctures. Be advised that the strong taste of this oil is due to it being full spectrum. It tastes like hemp, but after a while you get used to it. 10/10 Lazarus Naturals, you’ve just earned yourself another lifetime customer!

author: Sirsubohm
description: As most are aware, full spectrum oil, let alone in high potency, does have an herbal taste. Mixed in my coffee, I get this mild minty morning drink that literally sends me through my day! I can also take it under the tongue later on if needed with a sip or two of water. Lazarus is now my first and last stop to shop! Thank you Lazarus Naturals for this true game changer! I can’t wait to try more products!

author: Raccoonie
description: I love the high potency bottle. I love the taste and smell too. Thank you for making a good product and for having great customer service.

author: Ninjagopher2000
description: I’ve tried a few other cbd oils before this one. This one is the best. Flavor, customer experience, your assistance program all have won me over for a lifetime. Thank you for all you are doing for your customers.

author: kmans410
description: Hands down the best quality and value out there. I’ve ordered this product at least a dozen times now and it has always been consistently high quality.

author: Nathan Whitaker
description: I’ve tried multiple CBD companies, and Lazarus Naturals is by far the best value, and has an excellent product. Their assistance program is a lifesaver and really makes CBD more affordable for those who need it. Aside from that, the price can’t be beat, and the shipping, customer service, and purchasing experience is always incredible. A really wonderful company.

author: David Grosjean
description: Would like to say thank you for being such a compassionate company. After finding Lazarus Naturals online, it has been a wonderful experience from opening an account to applying for their Assistance Program, placing an order and shipping to my home. The quality of their product is the most satisfactory in the marketplace. They’re in contact with the customer by email through the whole process, real comforting to see a young group of people doing such a very good job. Thank you Jessie for a safe product arrival. Safe journeys.

author: kitched
description: I just placed my first order today. Thank you so much for the veterans discount. I’m so glad for finding LN, may God bless your company and all that work there. I can’t wait to receive my order. Also your website and and information is the best I’ve seen. You guys have nailed it. I wouldn’t want to purchase from anyone else. Once I get the CBD and try it, I’m sure I’ll be coming back to give it a stellar review.

author: jldbrut
description: I just want to say THANK YOU to Lazarus Naturals! They are helping so many people apply for the Assistance Program! I’ve tried others and nothing compares to Lazarus Naturals. I’ve been taking the High Potency Full Spectrum 6,000 mg for about a month. I can’t believe that something like this can help so much!

author: Mgm1018
description: Just received my first shipment. Excellent quality, taste is very palatable compared to other tinctures I’ve tried. With the quality and price that Lazarus Naturals offers, you simply cannot find anyone that can compete. Most other companies are like at least twice the price, with quality that might not even be as good as Lazarus Naturals. 10/10 highly recommended?

author: AL RAMSAY
description: This is the second CBD brand I’ve tried and I’ve been with them ever since. They have discounts to veterans and people with low income, which I fall into. 5 stars.

author: Ed
description: I really like this product, and really applaud and appreciate the companies effort to help folks in need with the Assistance Program. This is really a godsend. Really pure and good product, which I would recommend to family and friends.

author: Duffers
description: I have been using CBD oil for about 8 months, I find that my mood is good and stress is lessne. I don’t think I will ever go without this stuff, Lazarus, thank you for your wonderful product. CBD has improved my quality of life.

author: marybeth1972
description: WOW!! Blown away!On hope and and a prayer I decided to try your The High Potency and WOW..I am blown away at how I felt within a short time! i was literally sobbing with relief after the first time using your product!! bless you all for ALL you do!!

author: [email protected]
description: The High Potency is what we buy. It is phenomenal for me and my husband. We are firm believers in your product and will always be a loyal customer.

author: KittenLePurr
description: I can not recommend this highly enough, as well as Lazarus Naturals in general. This is the best value on CBD I’ve seen. I would give 100 stars if I could. Thank you, Lazarus Naturals!!! And thank you for helping people with disabilities and low income such as myself. I am now a forever-loyal customer!

author: Cindy
description: I want to take a minute to thank Lazarus Naturals for such great products. I’m super excited because this stuff works. I’m ordering my 3rd bottle now.

description: Love it!

author: BubbaHotep
description: I’ve been taking the high potency tincture for a week and can’t believe how good it is. I bought the high potency sample pack and it fantastic. I’ll continue to purchase this product.

author: Peppers1219
description: I have tried many different vetted brands of cbd oil, and Lazarus is by FAR the best and most effective. HIGHLY recommend.

author: ohdeeuhm
description: Lazarus Naturals high potency CBD oil works wonders for me. I’m so thankful to have access to it. As a matter of fact, I’m sitting here right now waiting on the mailman to arrive with my order.

author: koincidence
description: My first order was the small 15ml 750mg high potency tincture and I enjoyed it so much.Just ordered the 60ml 3000mg high potency CBD today and can’t wait to continue with this awesome product. Thank you Lazarus Naturals!

author: SteveZelenak
description: Works Great! I love your CBD Oil, Capsules & your RSO CBD. I went to fast at first. It’s better to start with 5 drops every few hours. Then I increased it to 10. It works better by going slowly & let it build up in your system. But everyone is different. You have to find out which works best For You!

author: SteveZelenak
description: I love your CBD Oil, Capsules & your RSO CBD. I went to fast at first. It’s better to start with 5 drops every few hours. Then I increased it to 10. It works better by going slowly & let it build up in your system. But everyone is different. You have to find out which works best For You!

author: Mmcheezitsyay
description: This is a great product and the best bang for my buck so far having tried tinctures from various vendors. It does taste pretty strong and nutty but I’ve gotten used to it and actually kind of like it now! Thank you Lazarus!

author: Cruzzy
description: I notice my focus is better and calms me and I sleep a little better.

author: Raven Wik
description: Wow that shipping was fast! I was buying cbd from another place and they were rude and sarcastic to me in an email so i decided to try this company. I got my order today and product smells great very earthy i like the measurments are right on the dropper for me so im not counting drops, prices are great customer service was great and shipping was super quick.

author: Trueg115
description: Lazarus Naturals has been like Lazarus coming back from the dead for me personally. It has helped my body to begin to work better again and take away pain, along with give an enhanced mood among many other things. Give it a try!

author: Brian
description:
After a week, I’m very happy. Lazarus is as good as any brand I’ve tried, and better than some that cost much more.
I use the high potency CBD and it is amazing. I’m able to do so much more, it’s simply amazing.
Great product at a great price.

author: newheart134
description: I want to thank Lazarus Naturals for such a wonderful product. I have been using for about a month. It helps so much, I believe between the coconut oil that I rub on and this product it will help me better. I wish I would have started this years ago !! Thank you so much

author: Pam
description: This company is amazing on many levels. Thank you Lazarus Naturals for making a difference in my life. I’m on my 4th bottle of CBD, it has helped me tremendously.

author: MeetMeInThe90s
description: This stuff is incredible. I’m astonished! And this site so generously offers the discount to those in need — I can’t say enough good about them AND the CBD they sell!! XOXO

author: Uberstephanie
description: I have tried others and Lazarus Naturals is by far the best CBD oil. I’m so grateful to Lazarus Naturals for making this wonderful product!

author: nickpc2001
description: This is some quality CBD. I have been using different brands for a while now and luckily I came across LN. I love the taste and smell of the unflavored. I am just thankful I am getting this REAL quality produce from a reputable company. Keep up the quality LN.

author: Robin Andrighetti
description: Can I put this through a g tube instead of sublingual? Thinking of trying this again for my daughter but she would need a high serving and probably spit it out.

author: Corey
description: Not only are the products affordable for the disabled, veterans, and less fortunate, but there is also a quality present that you can taste and feel. Satisfied customer that will order again.

author: dovand
description: Very very happy with the products

author: Kellbells
description:
This has been a god send to us. I love this product and recommend it to everyone I know.
Thank you for this amazing product, the amazing customer service team you have, and the assistance program that you offer!

author: Logard
description: My husband and I are using the 120ml, 6000 mg. product. It seemed to be the most cost effective for the number of 50mg CBD servings. We are both retired nurses. I have tried other brands and was picky about product and testing from the first. Lazarus Naturals is a good product at a reasonable price. Works well for our many issues. I was pleased with your companies easily accessible patient assistance program. No need to ask or email. I have not seen other companies offer this. BIG THUMBS UP!

author: Kenny Thatcher
description: Wonderful, excellent product.

author: trishadawn72
description: I love this CBD Oil! It helps my digestion, mood, sleep, and is a great supplement! Lazarus is also economical! Highly recommend!

author: obentoboy
description:
We just discovered CBD oil recently and decided to try the High Potency tincture. It has improved our health dramatically and we will continue to use this excellent product.

Thank you, Lazarus Naturals, for making your products affordable for veterans and others who struggle financially. Your company has been a godsend for our health concerns. You are the best bar none!

author: Sabrina Villegas
description: I never tried your product and I read a comment that you guys give discounts to the disabled that would be great because I’m jobless and want to get something to help me. I’m about to order from another company but if you give discounts to the disabled that’s I’d rather try your product.

author: [email protected]
description: I use cbd tinctures for support to get a full night of sleep. I’ve tried other brands that are supposedly “amazing” and all I did was waste money on stuff that doesn’t work. I recommend this for anyone.

author: Acleo813
description: When it comes to high quality CBD products that actually work, Lazarus Naturals is without a doubt the best. High quality and fast shipping, and fantastic customer service, there is no need to take your business elsewhere.

author: Chris
description: This has helped me be more calm through out the day, I’m grateful to find a product like this. I will be making my daily stops to this site.

author: Kristin Circle
description: This is amazing quality CBD that has changed my life for the better. This company does so much for low income people. It is really unbelievable and humbling. I will stick with this company for life. They embody their mission and inspire me to do for others as well.

author: jservant1198
description:
I believe this product has helped considerably. I can’t say enough good
things about Lazarus Naturals. Their products are very high quality which goes hand in hand with the
company itself! When I order a product it is shipped quickly and is beautifully packaged. I can tell they really care about their customers and the discount for Veterans is just amazing. Thank you for everything you do.

author: Khackee
description:
Lazarus Naturals, thank you! Your company is the model for others to set their standards. This high potency tincture works really well. The shipping was fast, efficient and environmentally sensitive with the use of biodegradable packing peanuts. Last, but certainly not least, the assistance and discount program for us veterans and those of us with disabilities, is a true gift from the almighty.
New customers can buy without worry.
Keep up the good work, stay safe during these dark hours and a heartfelt “THANK YOU LAZARUS NATURALS”

author: Rhonda Cornelison
description: I have tried several different CBD tinctures and Lazarus Naturals is the BEST. The assistance program also helps me afford your product. Thank you so much Lazarus Naturals!

author: Jessica
description: Extremely fast delivery! I love the earthy smell and graduated dropper. I’m looking forward to incorporating this tincture into my daily self-care practice.

author: Travis Furrer
description:
This product is my favorite so far. I actually really connect with the natural flavor of hemp, and prefer it to the flavored products (despite absolutely loving the natural flavorings as well!). I actually find the unflavored hemp taste quite pleasant and intriguing. I associate its unique smell/taste with the unique effects that it offers.

Lazarus Naturals tinctures are all excellent quality, consistency, and affordability. I would recommend these to anyone interested in CBD. Keep it coming, Lazarus Naturals!

author: np3266
description: I wish I had known sooner about this company and tried the high potency products. I’ve wasted so much time and money in trying other things. I’m so appreciative of this company that gives me the opportunity to be able to buy this at a discounted price because otherwise I simply can’t afford it otherwise. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

author: Michael Nickeas
description: There are other quality CBD companies out there. What makes Lazarus different is the selection and the price. They are the most reasonably priced company that I have found. This is extremely important to someone that uses a high potency oil like I do. I don’t understand why other companies charge almost twice the price for their oils. Lazarus has an excellent selection of flavors and potencies. I also have found their independent lab results to be more up to date and detailed than other companies. Overall a great product and a great company.

author: Sarah
description: Incredible product. You really get your bang for your buck. This is probably my absolute favorite.

author: Connor Pollock
description: Good CBD. Arrived on time, packaged well, product was exactly as described. Thanks Lazarus Naturals! I’ll be coming here from now on for my CBD needs.

author: William Melillo
description: There is fast turnaround on orders placed and you have outstanding customer service. I’m grateful for your assistance program to help those in need, especially veterans, low-income individuals, and the long-term disabled. It’s downright awesome to do business with a compassionate, community-minded, and customer-centric company. You have gained a loyal customer. Thank you.

author: Misskitty213
description: So wonderful! CBD really does work. Don’t expect the same type of pain relief you’d get from an opiate. CBD is very subtle. It builds up in your system. I know it works because when I DONT take it, the pain can be intense. I’m also to pain free. But it’s tolerable. It makes me feel better in general so that what pain remains is workable. The key is to take it CONSISTENTLY. I use high potency tincture both full spec & isolate. Coconut oil at bed time. And the balms or coconut oil for massage. Makes my skin smooth & supple, returning some elasticity to my 60 yr old dermis. Smells great too.

author: Chris
description: I love that Lazarus provides testing for every batch and that they are very easy to find. Thank you for a wonderful product. I will be recommending your product to others.

author: Bennet
description: Wonderful!!

author: Williamash
description: I will order again and am very grateful for the veterans discount! Thanks very much!

author: Mopelr
description: I am thrilled with the results and will continue to use the High potency Green 6000. I must say I am shocked at the person who gave you a glowing review in writing and then a 2 of 5 starts rating. Terrible. Also a 1 of 5 rating without having even tried the product. Another 1 of 5 saying a friend tested positive for THC which is impossible at .03. Let’s be careful how we rate and do it fairly people. Businesses rely on accurate ratings. Thank You

author: Trisha Brewer
description: I love this company and their amazing products! I have tried different CBD oils from 6 different companies, none of them came close to Lazarus Naturals. It was the first oil I tried and probably will be the one I continue to use for a very long time. This tincture helped me immensely! It gave me energy but also calmed my mind down as well. Another thing, their customer service is fantastic! I paid for express 2-day shipping on one of my previous orders but there was a miscommunication and it ended up being shipped standard and took a few more days then I expected. So I emailed them and they emailed me back the same day and refunded me the shipping costs. Overall, excellent high-quality products and amazing company! Thank you, guys!

author: ac0918
description: Works extremely well.

author: [email protected]
description: Looking to make an order. Does Lazarus make a product that can be used with a vaporizor/e-cigaraette set up? Can the tincture be added to an existing vape liquid?

author: Michael Freund
description: We do not currently make any products designed for vaping or use with e-cigarettes.

author: Ckl1975
description: These drops are worth every penny! I first tried the 3,000 mg. Then bumped it up to 6000mg. I use about 1-1.5ml per day. I was hit head-on by a drunk when I was 19 in 1995. Coma 6 weeks hospital 6 months. This makes my life so much easier to live! Thank you Lazarus naturals for making such an awesome product!! And for making it so affordable! These products are worth their weight in gold!

author: Fkasperski
description:
Great product and pretty fast FREE delivery.

Received my first order of a 6000mg tincture, high potency today.

I was wondering (just after initially ordering); should I have opted for a paid S&H vs the free. (I had no idea how long the FREE S&H would take to reach me, being I’m on the other side of the country basically).

But I ordered on a Friday and my order was received (across the country in MI) the following Thursday. So
S&H was pretty quick, about 6-7 days for the FREE option.
Depending on the destination, obviously, of the buyer.

Tried my first few servings of the High potency tincture. The taste is about like a regular hemp oil based product (if you’ve ever tasted an unflavored or raw one before).

I opted for the flavorless tincture and it was not as bad as some people online [in various forums] indicate the “unflavored” tinctures can be. Actually, it is quite palatable without needing anything to “chase it”.

Looking fwd to finding my proper serving size using this high potency tincture. I had just found it with a different brand, from a local dispensary. (But the dispensary tincture was not as potent, nor as highly rated as Lazarus products).

Before I forget, I was initially wondering and a bit concerned about packaging during shipment.
(After all, no one would want a bottle of tincture to leak).
WELL DON’T WORRY, They pkg the shipment very well.

They pkg their products [tincture at least] in a small, sturdy, solid box.
The inside is VERY well insulated with bubble wrap and foam style, bio-degrade peanuts.
It would be very unlikely any product packed this WELL would ever have any shipping issues.

Great initial purchase experience.

Finally, thanks a lot Lazarus for the assistance program, it is a HUGE blessing.

author: Raven Wik
description: This is my 3rd time ordering. I’m still happy with this company. People are loving my tinctures and my balm I can hardly keep on the shelf. I have had a handful of customers ask me for a tincture without coconut oil though due to allergies. They don’t offer this in a tincture only in Isolate which I’m still not sure if it will work the same. So I’m hoping a coconut free version will be available sometime in the future.

author: CandiceErika
description: I purchased this as part of the high potency set. This works so well. I have also noticed a decrease in irritability. It has a green herbal taste kind of verging on extra virgin olive oil. I don’t mind it at all. I hope to be able to afford this every month.

author: ew213
description:
I have taken various CBD products for several years from more expensive companies. I just received “Lazarus Naturals” high potency tincture today and through tasting it can attest its quality rivals others I’ve used. “Lazarus Naturals” will definitely be my “go to” company from now on.
Also, I want to publicly express my sincere gratitude to “Lazarus Naturals” for being a socially responsible company and through its “assistance program” granting me a wonderful discount for its products and helping others as well who are on “fixed” monthly incomes. The savings will allow me to “pay it forward” and contribute small monthly donations to others who are financially disadvantaged. Kudos to “Lazarus Naturals” and “thank you” again.

author: Relaxed
description: I just got mine delivered on Thursday and I will say this is the best thing I’ve spent money on in a while!! As a former THC user, there is a small chance that I will go back to using that again (at least until my state legalizes it). I literally get the same relief using CBD as I did with THC, but minus the intoxicating effects, which I don’t miss by the way. I feel alert yet relaxed all at the same time. The serving size recommends 1mL, but I’m good with just .5mL. I will be placing another order very soon. This stuff has changed my life!! Thank you Lazarus Naturals…total game changer!!

author: John
description: Any suggestion to help with the taste of the CBD oil? I was talking a different brand that wasn’t as potent. Then I switched to your brand. I have had a hard time keeping the oil under my tongue. I understand that you will have other flavor ones in the coming months. But I was hoping for some advice of the current bottle of the oil I have.

author: Michael Freund
description: You can try ingesting our tincture directly so you don’t have to keep it in your mouth as long, however, this may lower the amount of CBD your body eventually processes. You can also add the tincture to other foods or drinks to mask the flavor. Additionally, you can eat or drink something after taking the tincture to cleanse your pallet. We hope this helps!

author: evonne97
description: I have been trying to find the right brand of cbd to use and up until this point I’ve had no luck….until I found this high potency cbd tincture in 3000 mg. It works great if I take about 150-200 mg. Unfortunately that makes me run out of it pretty quickly. Hopefully, I hear back about my app with the assistance program soon. But overall, great product. Only thing I dislike is that it makes my mouth super dry, but other than that, it works. The taste is herbal, but not that bad. I love that the dropper has measurements on it so you can properly adjust serving size. It’s awesome! I recommend for those needing a stronger potency.

author: evonne97
description: I have been trying to find the right brand of cbd to use and up until this point I’ve had no luck….until I found this high potency cbd tincture in 3000 mg. It works great if I take about 150-200 mg. Unfortunately that makes me run out of it pretty quickly. Hopefully, I hear back about my app with the assistance program soon. But overall, great product. I love that the dropper has measurements on it so you can properly adjust serving size. It’s awesome! I recommend for those needing a stronger potency.

author: jlmachie
description: I was skeptical at first, but I needed something that actually works. I bought the high Potency Tincture to try….well, I am no longer a skeptic. It does work, while it isn’t a cure-all, it is very effective for me. I have been taking Lazarus Naturals CBD Tincture for about a month now and as a bonus, Lazarus offers an assistance program that includes Veterans. Which I think is absolutely outstanding !

author: mauricem00
description: Best CBD product I have found. Works better than the CBD products I found at the local dispensary. Great product and fantastic company. I ordered my second bottle this morning and would highly recommend this product to anyone.

author: Holger
description:
Holger W. Haffke
Correction: the article mentioned in my previous review is not from the Miami Herald but from the Miami tv station NBC 4 Miami. Here is the link: https://www.nbcmiami.com/news/local/patients-are-being-duped-nbc-6-tests-cbd-products-2/2455/ — .

author: Holger
description:
Due to Lazarus Naturals’ most generous discount for military veterans I am able to afford getting the High Potency CBD Tincture 6000 mg. I am totally amazed how well it has worked for me. I take some up to four times a day. The large 6000 mg bottle doesn’t last me very long so I just ordered 2 bottles again, just to be sure that I will not ever run out and then have to wait for a delivery via UPS. I feel like a new man at age 77.
What a great group of people who are willing to help Veterans, the disabled and low income people with an almost unbelievable discount on their products!!! May God bless you all! Yes, I am completely blown away by this company and their truly effective and completely honest CBD product. I can’t help myself from praising their fast service and kindness.
I also would like to mention that I saw an article from the Miami Herald (I believe it was Herald) where they tested the CBD oil from about 18 different companies and found many that were dishonest in the amounts of CBD in their products. Only two companies were mentioned by name and Lazarus Naturals was one of them, who were found to be completely truthful in their claims. Isn’t that remarkable? Here is the company with the lowest prices for their products found to be totally honest and trustworthy! Yes, Lazarus Naturals can be trusted and I, especially after reading this article trust Lazarus Naturals completely. In my book Lazarus Naturals deserves the highest accolades for being what they are: a truly reliable and humanitarian company servicing people like me with a product that undoubtedly works wonders. To anyone that is still unsure, I only want to say: “Just do yourselves a favor and get the Lazarus Naturals full spectrum CBD oil, because you can’t do any better anywhere else…and have patience….find your ‘sweet spot’ and experience the ‘miracle’ this CBD oil can do for you.”
Thank you, thank you, thank you to all Lazarus Naturals employees,
Holger W. Haffke (this is my real name and I am certainly not affiliated with Lazarus Naturals).

author: Ian Marzolino
description: I am 100% satisfied. Thank you very much Lazarus.

author: EllieC-B
description: I had not thought of CBD oil much before, but once it arrived I have used it daily. I slept so deep that night- and each night since ( it has been 4 days now). My dogs have been taking the pet formula for months, and both get happy when I take out the bottle and can smell what is coming! One of my dogs starts taking deep, relaxing sighs just after taking his tincture! I researched a lot, this is the first and only company I have bought from. I love their integrity! I will look in to seeing if I can qualify for low income discount. Thank you for a wonderful product and being service-minded!

author: Chris P
description: Love it!! Currently on my second bottle of 6000mg. I take 50 to 100mg per day. Gives me clarity, and helps me to be less stressed at my job. I get almost 4 months out of each bottle! Quality and price can’t be beat!!

author: MNwoods
description:
This unflavored oil has what I would call a powerful vegetation flavor. If taste is a primary concern to you, I would highly suggest choosing one of the flavored tinctures. The smell/flavor on this one doesn’t bother me.

I like the stronger potency on this one. I can take less (by volume) and get the same as before. I’ve definitely noticed that CBD products help me. The assistance program for vets, people on disability, and low income folks is a life-saver.

I was just looking for a safe product from a company that tested their products, but in finding Lazarus Naturals I found a company with a commitment to their customers on so many levels. Thanks!
